text: (Allah nirakarittavarkalai alaittu cikaravacikalaic cuttik kanpittu,) ‘‘allah arulpuriya mattan enru ninkal cattiyam ceytu kurik kontiruntirkale avarkal (ito cikarattil irukkum) ivarkal allava?'' (Enru kuruvan). (Piraku, cikaravacikalai nokki) ‘‘ninkal corkkam cenruvitunkal. Unkalukku evvita payamumillai. Ninkal kavalaippatavum mattirkal'' (enru allah kuruvan)
